title: Acupunctureworld | Multiple Systems: Balance System Acupuncture - Level 2 | comprar online
description: Acupunctureworld ✅ Multiple Systems: Balance System Acupuncture - Level 2 ✅ e-Learning ✅ prices from 24,75€
text:
Multiple Systems: Balance System Acupuncture - Level 2
by Sonia Tan
This class will discuss treatment of functional disorders and how to treat them with multiple systems of the Balance Method of Acupuncture. Students will extend their clinical reach from musculoskeletal (MSK) and pain, to internal medicine.
Multiple Systems: Balance System Acupuncture - Level 2
Course OverviewThis course expands on the basic principles taught in the Balance System of Acupuncture Level I - Single Systems. This class will discuss treatment of functional and internal disorders and how to treat them with multiple systems of the Balance Method / System of Acupuncture. Students will expand on the knowledge from Level I, extending their clinical reach from musculoskeletal (MSK), orthopedics and pain, to treating internal medicine disorders, including the discussion of complicated cases that include both MSK pain and functional internal disorders. The mirror and imaging format will be further discussed and how it is used in clinical practice to treat internal issues and body pain. Advanced treatments will be discussed such as Eight-Meridian combo for gynecological issues. A Four-Meridian will also be discussed as a treatment strategy to treat bronchial disorders, cardiology symptoms, digestive disorders and urogenital diseases. Practitioners will understand how to approach complicated cases involving multiple meridians in clinical practice.
Pre-requisite: Balance System of Acupuncture Level 1 - Single Systems.
Promo Video
Course Objectives
- Select the most efficient meridians to heal multiple sick meridians.
- Differentiate dynamic and static balance.
- Design a treatment plan/strategy that incorporates dynamic and static balance to heal multiple meridians.
- Apply pre-designed strategies to treat a variety of health conditions.
- Locate specific acupuncture points within the Balance Method/System.
Course Outline
0 hrs - 15 minReview of the history and origins of the Balance System of Acupuncture. Review of Acupuncture Level 1 - Single Systems. Review of Imaging and Mirror format.
15 min - 30 minIntroduction of the strategies of the structure of Multiple Systems (Global) balancing.
30 min - 1.5 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy A - $LBP. Visual presentation and protocol of $LBP. Discussion of dosage and review of Global Balance requirements.
1.5 hrs - 1.75 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy B and C - Dr. R. Tan’s Magic 4 Midline meridians - for chest disorders (cardio-pulmonary), and for low abdominal disorders (gastrointestinal urogential). Visual presentation and protocol of Magic 4 Midline.
1.75 hrs - 2.25 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy D - Dr. R. Tan’s Magic 9 meridians - for any digestive disorders. Visual presentation and protocol of Magic 9.
2.25 hrs - 2.5 hrsDiscussion of choosing between Single vs. Multiple systems balancing. Case studies.
2.5 hrs - 2.75 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy D - Dr. R. Tan’s Magic 4 for any Heat (defy or xs). Visual presentation and protocol of Magic 4 Heat.
2.75 hrs - 3 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy E - Dr. R. Tan’s Magic 4 Female Hormone balance.
3 hrs - 3.25 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy F - Dr. R. Tan’s Magic 4 Male Hormone balance.
3.25 hrs - 3.75 hrsTreating Functional Disorders: Strategy H - Dr. R. Tan’s OBGYN 8. Visual presentation and protocol of OBGYN 8.
3.75 hrs - 4 hrsCase study of OBGYN 8 strategy.
4 hrs - 4.5 hrsSummary and review of guidelines to constructing treatments for internal diseases and cases involving both pain and functional problems. Summary of all pre-designed "Magic" strategies. Summary of further levels of learning and support.
Teacher
[More...](https://www.acupunctureworld.com/e-learning/teachers/sonia-tan/)
The course is amazing. Dr. Tan takes the time to slowly explain the background and reasoning behind why each meridian and suggested points are used. Her knowledge of the system is clearly exceptional. I know little of Balance Method initially, but now have a much greater understanding of this system and am excited to begin using it immediately. I will continue on past Levels 1 and 2 to complete the full course. Mark B.United States of America
Dr. Sonia Tan brings an approachability and clarity to Balance Acupuncture that is refreshing. I've known about the Balance Method for years, and I even owned all of the books, but I've never understood it like I have after studying with Sonia Tan. If you've wanted to to use the Balance Method, but didn't know where to begin, look no further. Dr Sonia Tan's teaching is it.Michael H.United States of America
presentation and explanation is exceptional Robert P.United States of America
Highly recommended for all practitioners in search of new clinically effective and practical methods of channel balancing.Gavin L.Canada
Greatly exceptional to know the concepts taught in this second level. I now feel more confident in my journey. In anticipation of the advanced learning possible in this area of healing, I am looking forward for more mentorship opportunity. Nurudeen A.Canada
Great class! Has many of effective, customizable treatments to bring to clinic. Jessica K.United States of America
Very humble, kind and generous teacher. Materials designed and delivered comprehensively but easily to follow.Duyen C.Canada
Very clear and well detailed course. I highly recommend courses given by Sonia Tan.Marina P.Denmark
I am learning a value knowledge which is one of the good things that have happened to me on earthJEPHTHAH B.Nigeria
I would recommend itAngelique O.Netherlands
